name: Guitar Rock Tour
synopsis: If you like rock music and have a sense of rhythm, your road to stardom starts here! Guitarist or drummer, enjoy the addictive gameplay: touch the Touch Screen or press buttons to the beat of your favourite songs. Prepare your ears for the explosive tracklist of Guitar Rock Tour: 15 worldwide hits, including Girlfriend, Banquet, Beat It, Rock You Like a Hurricane, and more! Take photos of you or your friends with the Nintendo DSi Camera to customise stages and goodies: a new rock idol is born!
